item.title: Essential Math
item.description: Our Test Values Sum Length Mean Our Test Values R Here’s a numeric vector for our R code. x <- c(1.5, 2, 3.25, 4.9, 5, 6.1, 7.39, 8, 9.9) Python Here’s a list of floats for our Python code. x = [1.5, 2, 3.25, 4.9, 5, 6.1, 7.39, 8, 9.9] Sum R Manually implementing R’s sum() get_sum <- function(values) { the_sum <- 0 for(i in values) { the_sum <- the_sum + i } return(the_sum) } The result of our custom get_sum() function in R:
